title: Home
author: - N G; Seattle; WA
description: Seattle Naturopathic and Acupuncture Center offers holistic care to address digestive issues, food allergies, hormonal imbalance and acupuncture.
cleaned_text: Seattle Naturopathic Doctor and Acupuncturist, Dr. Lee, is dedicated to empowering you to reach better health. Welcome to Seattle Naturopathic and Acupuncture Center. Dr. Diane Lee is a Naturopathic Doctor and Licensed Acupuncturist who provides a wide variety of health assessments and natural therapies to meet your unique health challenges. She practices integrative primary care and Naturopathic family medicine, Chinese Medicine/Acupuncture with an emphasis on the integration between conventional and complimentary care. She is proud to be providing natural health services to the greater Seattle, Washington area. Her philosophy is to treat the whole person utilizing the least invasive methods possible, while maintaining a primary focus on the prevention of illness. With special interests in dermatology, gastroenterology, and chronic pain conditions, Dr. Lee incorporates detoxification and environmental medicine in treating difficult cases. Not only has she received advanced training in injection therapies from numerous mentors, Dr. Lee has also solidified her techniques in mesotherapy through training in France with Dr. Jacques LeCoz. OUR CORE SERVICES Result you can trust [Click here to see all testimonial](https://seattlenaturopathiccenter.com/testimonials/) "I have had skin problems for many years and have tried many topical creams and medications. A friend recommended me to see Dr. Lee. After some detail history taking" "I took my son in to see Dr Lee. She was great. She spent adequate amount of time with him. Was very thorough. We felt really good about seeing her." "I had been looking for a medical doctor who knew about and practised mesotherapy. Very few doctors seem to practice it in this country and do so mainly for
